sdkFilesystem.title: Filesystem API
sdkFilesystem.subtitle: Save and open files through native system dialogs.

overview.title: Overview
overview.intro: The Filesystem API allows your extension to save and open files through native system dialogs. All operations require user interaction, ensuring security and transparency.
overview.note: All filesystem operations show native dialogs to the user. There is no silent file access.
